com.evernote.android.job

Class JobBootReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.evernote.android.job.JobBootReceiver

  • public final class JobBootReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    A BroadcastReceiver rescheduling jobs after a reboot, if the underlying JobApi can't handle it.
